I haven’t wash them because I may return, and I’ve only had it on for a minute just to try the fit, and the fit is good; true to size. Verdict: undecided and disappointed.
Nice quality cotton cardigan that has a good weight to it. Great price. Pleased with my purchase.

The LILLUSORY Women's Cardigan Sweater is a nicely made lightweight sweater. The XL fits more like one would expect from an L. As shown in the product photos, this is a longer sweater that will go well below your waist. There are no pockets, which is appropriate for the style and weight of this sweater. The pink color is attractive and accurately shown in the product photos.
was extremely surprised what a quality product this is! very satisfied! Don’t hesitate to buy!
I bought two, black and navy. Size, texture, color, price, and material are perfect for me!

I ordered this 100% cotton sweater in 3 colors: white, pink, navy.  They wash very well.  I did air dry them. The small fits my 5"4"  110 lb frame perfectly.  I am thinking about ordering more colors as this is a clothing staple for layering as Florida weather can be cool at times.  And, finding 100% cotton is not always easy, especially at this price point.  Thank You Lillusory.
The bottom of this sweater became stretched out after washing it.  I washed it in cold water and dried it flat.  Would not buy again.

This sweater is a nice quality sweater on its own. I liked the color and the material. But the problem is it came very tightly vacuum packed in plastic. When I opened it the buttons had imprinted on the sweater in various places because they had pressed so hard into the fabric for I don't know how long - how ever long it was packaged that way. Its not something you can iron out because its indented into the fabric now. I let it hang on a hanger for days hoping they might fall out or at least lessen. I tried massaging the spots a little to see if the fabric would spring back at all and fill in the indents. No luck with anything I've tried. Its really a disappointment because I like the sweater and was hoping to wear it with nicer outfits but it looks bad with the indented spots with the button imprint in random spots over the sweater. Too bad. I haven't worn it yet, but I may just wear it around the house now because I can't bring myself to wear it out like that.

评论概述: Love the knit of this sweater
评论详情: I was hoping the description “light weight” was correct and it certainly was! I live in Florida and always need sweaters for the A/C even in the winter.  The buttons are dyed to match (I ordered pink). I ordered size sm. (5’3”, 125lb.) and it fits perfectly. I can match it with scarves, handbags and shoes and change the look dressed up or down and I’m thrilled with my purchase!!

评论概述: Strange plasticy texture, sizing way off
评论详情: My first mistake was following the Amazon recommended sizing, which had me drowning in this cardigan. I opted to return instead of exchange because the texture felt so strangely plasticy. I think I've finally learned my lesson to not buy clothes on Amazon anymore. (fingers crossed that I've actually learned this time)
I am very happy with this cardigan.  Holds it shape well. Love the weight of it. I am planning on buying more.
I ordered navy color. The sweater is well made and holds up nicely. It's a little heavier that I thought it would be. But I am keeping it. Comes with an extra button just in case.

There was no shape at all. This might be a good fit for some, but wasn't for me. Loved the color and the material seemed good enough but I had to return because of the poor fit.

评论概述: I found my perfect cotton cardigan!
评论详情: I have been searching for a lightweight, all-purpose, easy care, good-looking cardigan and this is it!  I am petite and hard to fit and this cardigan fits me great.
Fits pretty well and fabric is medium weight not thin or cheap. Pretty conservative style but functional. I washed but didn’t machine dry to keep length and shape and held up well.

This cardigan is such a good quality material, and really well made. The color is exactly as pictured, and the neutral tan looks so good with a lot of my outfits. It’s thick and warm, and can be worn with a lot of different outfits and combinations, so it’s pretty versatile too. It fit me perfectly, so I’d say it’s pretty true to your normal size. The material is soft and cozy and is really flattering overall, definitely a win in my book!

I wanted a button-down or zippered 100% cotton sweater and this item meets my needs.  Because of surgery, I ordered two-sizes up and am pleased with the sweater.  It is comfortable and warm, and did not shrink when washed.

You will be pleased with this sweater because I am so happy that I took a chance.  The material is not too thick or too thin with a stylish neckline that can be buttoned all the way up if it gets too cold.  I have limited function in my shoulders so I need a sweater where the arms aren't too tight because it makes it too hard to put on and remove.  This sweater went on with ease. It's a rich black that provides a classic look that you can wear with jeans running errands or to the office. You can basically wear any color underneath.  It fits slenderlly with a soft material that will keep you from feeling the chill in the air.
